ame":"_token","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_amount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_amountOutMinimum","type":"uint256"}],"name":"swapTokenToBorrow","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"tokenLists","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"tokenListsId","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalCollateral","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_user","type":"address"}],"name":"withdrawCollateral","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"stateMutability":"payable","type":"receive"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Senja Labs","details":"This contract handles position management, token swapping, and collateral operations The Position contract represents a user's lending position in the Senja protocol. It manages collateral assets, borrow assets, and provides functionality for: - Withdrawing collateral - Swapping tokens within the position - Repaying loans with selected tokens - Calculating token values and exchange rates Key features: - Reentrancy protection for secure operations - Dynamic token list management - Price oracle integration for accurate valuations - Restricted access control (only lending pool can call certain functions)","errors":{"InsufficientOutputAmount(uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"amountOut":"The actual output amount received","amountOutMinimum":"The minimum expected output amount"}}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"Liquidate(address)":{"params":{"user":"The address of the user whose position was liquidated"}},"SwapToken(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens being swapped","token":"The address of the token being swapped","user":"The address of the user performing the swap"}},"SwapTokenByPosition(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amountIn":"The amount of input tokens","amountOut":"The amount of output tokens received","tokenIn":"The address of the input token","tokenOut":"The address of the output token","user":"The address of the user initiating the swap"}},"WithdrawCollateral(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of collateral withdrawn","user":"The address of the user withdrawing collateral"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"_tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Uses price oracle to determine exchange ratesHandles different token decimals automatically for accurate conversionFormula: amountOut = (amountIn * quotePrice * 10^tokenOutDecimal) / (basePrice * 10^tokenInDecimal)","params":{"_amountIn":"The amount of input tokens","_tokenIn":"The address of the input token","_tokenOut":"The address of the output token"},"returns":{"_0":"The calculated output amount in terms of the output token"}},"constructor":{"details":"Sets up the initial position with collateral token registered in the token listIncrements counter and registers the collateral token as the first token in the list","params":{"_lpAddress":"The address of the lending pool contract","_user":"The address of the user who owns this position"}},"liquidation(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only the lending pool can call this functionTransfers ownership to the liquidatorIterates through all tokens in the position and transfers their balancesHandles both wrapped native tokens and regular ERC20 tokens","params":{"_liquidationBonus":"The amount of liquidation bonus to be transferred to the liquidator","_liquidator":"The address of the liquidator who will receive all tokens"}},"repayWithSelectedToken(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only the lending pool can call this functionIf the selected token is not the borrow asset, it will be swapped firstApproves lending pool to spend the borrow tokens and transfers themHandles both direct repayment and swap-then-repay scenarios","params":{"_amount":"The amount to repay","_amountOutMinimum":"The minimum amount of borrow token expected after swap (slippage protection)","_token":"The address of the token to use for repayment"}},"swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only the lending pool can call this functionUses DEX router for token swapping with slippage protectionAutomatically registers both tokens in the position's token listReverts if insufficient balance or output amount is below minimum","params":{"_amountIn":"The amount of input tokens to swap","_amountOutMinimum":"The minimum amount of output tokens expected (slippage protection)","_tokenIn":"The address of the input token","_tokenOut":"The address of the output token"},"returns":{"amountOut":"The actual amount of output tokens received"}},"swapTokenToBorrow(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only the lending pool can call this functionTransfers token from caller, calculates collateral needed, performs swap, and sends borrow token to lending poolApproves lending pool to spend the swapped borrow tokens","params":{"_amount":"The amount to swap","_amountOutMinimum":"The minimum amount of borrow token expected (slippage protection)","_token":"The address of the token to swap from"}},"totalCollateral()":{"details":"Iterates through all tokens in the positionConverts each token balance to collateral token value using price oraclesSums up all token values to get total collateral","returns":{"_0":"The total collateral value denominated in the collateral token"}},"withdrawCollateral(uint256,address)":{"details":"Only the lending pool can call this functionTransfers collateral tokens to the specified userHandles both ERC20 tokens and native tokens (unwraps if necessary)","params":{"_user":"The address of the user to receive the collateral","amount":"The amount of collateral to withdraw"}}},"stateVariables":{"_withdrawing":{"details":"Track if we're in a withdrawal operation to avoid auto-wrapping native tokens"}},"title":"Position","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"InsufficientBalance()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when there are insufficient tokens for an operation"}],"InsufficientOutputAmount(uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Error thrown when the output amount is less than the minimum amount"}],"InvalidParameter()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when an invalid parameter is provided"}],"NotForSwap()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when a swap operation is not authorized"}],"NotForWithdraw()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when a withdrawal operation is not authorized"}],"OnlyForLendingPool()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when a function is called by unauthorized address"}],"OracleOnTokenNotSet()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when oracle on token is not set"}],"TransferFailed()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when a native token transfer fails"}],"ZeroAmount()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when attempting to process a zero amount"}]},"events":{"Liquidate(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a position is liquidated"},"SwapToken(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are swapped within the position"},"SwapTokenByPosition(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are swapped by the position contract"},"WithdrawCollateral(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when collateral is withdrawn from the position"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"_tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates the output amount for a token swap based on price feeds"},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructor to initialize a new position"},"counter()":{"notice":"Counter for tracking the number of unique tokens in the position"},"liquidation(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Liquidates the position and transfers all tokens to the liquidator"},"lpAddress()":{"notice":"The address of the lending pool contract"},"owner()":{"notice":"The address of the position owner"},"repayWithSelectedToken(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Repays a loan using a selected token"},"swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Swaps tokens within the position using DEX"},"swapTokenToBorrow(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Swaps a token to the borrow token via DEX"},"tokenLists(uint256)":{"notice":"Mapping from token ID to token address"},"tokenListsId(address)":{"notice":"Mapping from token address to token ID"},"totalCollateral()":{"notice":"Calculates the total collateral value in the position"},"withdrawCollateral(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Withdraws collateral from the position"}},"notice":"A contract that manages lending positions with collateral and borrow 20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1a6221315ce0307746c2c4827c125d821ee796c74a676787762f4778671d4f44","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1bb2332a7ee26dd0b0de9b7fe266749f54820c99ab6a3bcb6f7e6b751d47ee2d","dweb:/ipfs/QmcRWpaBeCYkhy68PR3B4AgD7asuQk7PwkWxrvJbZcikLF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x74ed01eb66b923d0d0cfe3be84604ac04b76482a55f9dd655e1ef4d367f95bc2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5282825a626cfe924e504274b864a652b0023591fa66f06a067b25b51ba9b303","dweb:/ipfs/QmeCfPykghhMc81VJTrHTC7sF6CRvaA1FXVq2pJhwYp1dV"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Metadata.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd6fa4088198f04eef10c5bce8a2f4d60554b7ec4b987f684393c01bf79b94d9f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f95ee0bbd4dd3ac730d066ba3e785ded4565e890dbec2fa7d3b9fe3bad9d0d6e","dweb:/ipfs/QmSLr6bHkPFWT7ntj34jmwfyskpwo97T9jZUrk5sz3sdtR"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x982c5cb790ab941d1e04f807120a71709d4c313ba0bfc16006447ffbd27fbbd5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8150ceb4ac947e8a442b2a9c017e01e880b2be2dd958f1fa9bc405f4c5a86508","dweb:/ipfs/QmbcBmFX66AY6Kbhnd5gx7zpkgqnUafo43XnmayAM7zVdB"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x11a5a79827df29e915a12740caf62fe21ebe27c08c9ae3e09abe9ee3ba3866d3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3cf0c69ab827e3251db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/Position.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8bdd54c349d50fc4dfed4c1bc7c02e4791b076919290368b97e5467f74a67686","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://294fdfe2d442d1b03968075dfcc633cb1142 _tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256.details: Uses price oracle to determine exchange ratesHandles different token decimals automatically for accurate conversionFormula: amountOut = (amountIn * quotePrice * 10^tokenOutDecimal) / (basePrice * 10^tokenInDecimal)

params._tokenIn: The address of the input token
params._tokenOut: The address of the output token

returns._0: The calculated output amount in terms of the output token

constructor.details: Sets up the initial position with collateral token registered in the token listIncrements counter and registers the collateral token as the first token in the list

params._lpAddress: The address of the lending pool contract
params._user: The address of the user who owns this position

liquidation(address,uint256).details: Only the lending pool can call this functionTransfers ownership to the liquidatorIterates through all tokens in the position and transfers their balancesHandles both wrapped native tokens and regular ERC20 tokens

params._liquidationBonus: The amount of liquidation bonus to be transferred to the liquidator
params._liquidator: The address of the liquidator who will receive all tokens

repayWithSelectedToken(address,uint256,u.details: Only the lending pool can call this functionIf the selected token is not the borrow asset, it will be swapped firstApproves lending pool to spend the borrow tokens and transfers themHandles both direct repayment and swap-then-repay scenarios

params._amountOutMinimum: The minimum amount of borrow token expected after swap (slippage protection)
params._token: The address of the token to use for repayment

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.details: Only the lending pool can call this functionUses DEX router for token swapping with slippage protectionAutomatically registers both tokens in the position's token listReverts if insufficient balance or output amount is below minimum

params._amountIn: The amount of input tokens to swap
params._amountOutMinimum: The minimum amount of output tokens expected (slippage protection)
params._tokenIn: The address of the input token
params._tokenOut: The address of the output token

returns.amountOut: The actual amount of output tokens received

swapTokenToBorrow(address,uint256,uint25.details: Only the lending pool can call this functionTransfers token from caller, calculates collateral needed, performs swap, and sends borrow token to lending poolApproves lending pool to spend the swapped borrow tokens

params._amountOutMinimum: The minimum amount of borrow token expected (slippage protection)
params._token: The address of the token to swap from

totalCollateral().details: Iterates through all tokens in the positionConverts each token balance to collateral token value using price oraclesSums up all token values to get total collateral

returns._0: The total collateral value denominated in the collateral token

withdrawCollateral(uint256,address).details: Only the lending pool can call this functionTransfers collateral tokens to the specified userHandles both ERC20 tokens and native tokens (unwraps if necessary)

params._user: The address of the user to receive the collateral
params.amount: The amount of collateral to withdraw

_tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256.notice: Calculates the output amount for a token swap based on price feeds

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize a new position

counter().notice: Counter for tracking the number of unique tokens in the position

liquidation(address,uint256).notice: Liquidates the position and transfers all tokens to the liquidator

lpAddress().notice: The address of the lending pool contract

owner().notice: The address of the position owner

repayWithSelectedToken(address,uint256,u.notice: Repays a loan using a selected token

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.notice: Swaps tokens within the position using DEX

swapTokenToBorrow(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Swaps a token to the borrow token via DEX

tokenLists(uint256).notice: Mapping from token ID to token address

tokenListsId(address).notice: Mapping from token address to token ID

totalCollateral().notice: Calculates the total collateral value in the position
